title: [M][snapshot][automation] README Snapshot Publishing Epic
description: Automate generating a world snapshot from sim.py, writing it to README via update script, and wiring it into the daily workflow and local tooling.

title: [S][sim][snapshot] Implement snapshot generator + CLI flag
description: Add the generate_snapshot helper and --snapshot flag in sim.py, writing snapshots to snapshot.md when invoked alongside dev/prod ticks.

title: [S][script][docs] Create snapshot update script + README markers
description: Add update_readme.py that replaces content between <!-- SNAPSHOT START/END --> and seed README.md with the snapshot block placeholder.

title: [S][ci][automation] Wire snapshot + README updates into daily workflow
description: Run python sim.py --prod --snapshot, invoke update_readme.py, and commit README/state/history/snapshot outputs inside .github/workflows/daily.yml.

title: [XS][repo][gitignore] Track snapshot artifact expectations
description: Add snapshot.md to .gitignore (alongside state_dev.json) so local runs don't dirty the tree while Actions commits the prod snapshot copy.

title: [S][testing][docs] Document local snapshot testing steps
description: Capture the manual flow for running python sim.py --dev --snapshot, inspecting snapshot.md, updating README via update_readme.py, and reverting changes for dry runs.
